name: ETHEREAL
description: A profound experience that carries players into an unknown and mysterious world surrounded by carefully designed puzzles...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1/10 x86 or x64 Processor: Intel Core2 Quad Q8200 (4 * 2330) / AMD Athlon II X4 645 AM3 (4 * 3100) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX10-compliant card with minimum 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1/10 x86 or x64 Processor: Intel Core2 Quad Q9400 (4 * 2666) / AMD Phenom II X4 965 (4 * 3400) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTS 450 (1024 MB) / Radeon HD 4890 (1024 MB) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space
